This is an website, for Hannah.

```{r cars}
cats <- data.frame("name" = c("Ada", "Bea"),
                   "birth_year" = c(2009, 2011),
                   "color_primary" = c("white", "black"),
                   "color_secondary" = c("gray", "white"))
```

## Cats

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(viridisLite)
ggplot(cats, aes(x = birth_year, fill = name)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = viridis(2)) +
  theme_minimal()
```
